page.title: 15INDUSTRY
page.content: GALLIFORDS, WOLVEY HEATH. Gallifords is a construction company which works all over the country. It undertakes projects to build factories and offices, and sometimes schools and hospitals as well. It also specializes in plant hire and pipe lines. The company began just before the second world war, actually at Wolvey Heath. Peter Galliford was the founder. It started with just one man and a steam roller, becoming a public company in 1967. Many small companies have merged with Galliford, including Brindley Ashfelt, and it has grown considerably. They own over 100 acres, Some farmland, at Wolvey Heath. The number of staff working there full time is about 200, and these come from quite a wide area around. Wolvey Grange which is owned by the company is used as the head office.
